content: tcm390: Focused on bug fixes with 6 merged PRs addressing API issues (#3767), build errors (#3765), speech-to-text functionality (#3760), client chat (#3759), and other client fixes (#3754, #3750), collectively modifying 245 files (+2836/-2737 lines). Also contributed a new feature with PR #3770 adding a button for navigation to home/chat page, and identified a media parameter error in issue #1183. Maintained a moderately consistent work pattern, active on 3 days this week with 39 commits primarily focused on bug fixes (38%) and other work (41%).
